description:
Indranil Ghosh


Massey University

"The talk will start with important prerequisites that need to be developed before starting with serious numerical optimization algorithms. Concepts like ""a solution"", ""minimization/maximization"", ""scaling"", ""objective function"", ""gradient and Hessian"" and so on will be introduced."

title: Indranil Ghosh - Using Python to start learning Unconstrained Numerical Optimization Algorithms
